ygData.subject: Re: Clerics and Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That clerics are weak at melee is not the point.  The point is that all the classes that have weak defensive skills have options other than meleeing -
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 17 Sep 1999, Elijah Meeker wrote:
>
> First off, in my twenties I can outdamage my cleric comrade in any melee
> situation. Dual Wield does increas the amount of damage I can do
> significantly. Once in their 20s Clerics are weak melee players, I just

That clerics are weak at melee is not the point. The point is
that all the classes that have weak defensive skills have
options other than meleeing - root/nuke or pet/nuke. The
classes that have to melee have strong defensive skills.
Except us.

I suppose we can always kite...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
